resources.string: Click the SUBSCRIBE TO NEWS button below to subscribe to the news topic. Messages sent to the news topic will be received. The LOG TOKEN button logs the InstanceID token to logcat.
No messages. Start chatting at the bottom!

Anonymous authentication failed, various components of the demo will not work. Make sure your device is online and that Anonymous Auth is configured in your Firebase project(https://console.firebase.google.com/project/_/authentication/providers)
